title: Cupcake Day 5K, 10K and Half Marathon - Los Angeles
desc: Okay people! December 15 is  National Cupcake Day   and you know what that means! ?It's time for a Cupcake Day virtual race to celebrate! Will you run for cupcakes? ?We sure hope so! ?Sign up and we'll mail you an awesomely adorable cupcake medal! We will also be donating a portion of the proceeds (at least $4 for every registration) to the  Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research.  ?Help us celebrate cupcakes and raise money for a phenomenal charity! For participating in this event you will get a fun, 3.5 inch CUPCAKE DAY?finishers medal!  When: ?Complete your race any time during the month of?December (if you can run it on December 15 - Cupcake Day, event better). *Medals will be shipped out at the?end of November?2015.? Where: ??You choose the course and you time yourself (you?ll report your finishing time to us). Why : ?To raise awareness for Parkinson's?Research, and to celebrate CUPCAKES!!!   COST:?  $18, which includes your medal and shipping. ?Plus,? at least?$4  of every registration will go to the  Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research. **Check out our sister site,  Moon Joggers!   Join their main event,? MEET ME ON MARS ?(one of the paid registration options) now and you?ll be able to save 25% on all of their? virtual races!  Sign up? HERE . (Use code VIRTUALRUN?to save 15% on  Meet Me on Mars ). You can also sign up for their free option and start logging your miles now.
